title: Potty Knight Saga
description:
A player described this game as “Dark Souls meets Mario .” It’s quite an amusing analogy, and surprisingly accurate too. Player Wanted For hazardous journey, bitter condition, long months of complete darkness , constant danger, safe return doubtful, honor and recognition in case of success. Potty Knight Saga is a platformer action game heavily focused on very difficult level design. Who Wants To Be A Millionaire
This game is so simple. easy for anyone to play and focused on playing fun.  But it’s not easy to clear this game Korean gamer’s talent is already recognized not only in Korea but in the world-wide What those Korean gamers said the most after playing in the biggest game show in Korea
The developer of this game spoke confidently “Does this game look cute?, But this game is the pinnacle of the challenge” And a word that’s hidden inside “I’m looking forward to your screams :)”So what kind of game is it? The controls are simple but It’s an adventure game with a very difficult level
